name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stem Splitter for Udio and Suno Songs

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your music experience with this Stem Splitter for Udio and Suno Songs using WavTool.com!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your music experience with the Stem Splitter for Udio and Suno Songs! This Chrome extension effortlessly redirects you to WavTool.com where you can split stems from your favorite songs on Udio and Suno. (this also works with a free account)

üëâüèª Important: You need a free account on WavTool to make this work!


‚ùì Why does this plugin needs Browsing history access?
‚ùó Nothing to worry about. This plugin needs tab permission to open a new tab and context menu permission to use the right click menu. Thats all. I am not reading anything or storing anything anywhere. You can check your network traffic for that :) 


üöÄ Features:

- Stem Splitting: Access a free tool to split audio stems from songs on Udio and Suno, perfect for musicians, DJs, and music enthusiasts.
- Easy to Use: Just click the extension icon, and the new tab with the stem splitter will open automatically, saving you time and effort.


üöÄ Benefits:

- Convenience: Simplifies the process of accessing a stem splitter for Udio and Suno songs without manual URL changes.
- Enhanced Music Production: Perfect for those looking to remix, produce, or learn from their favorite tracks by isolating vocals, instruments, and other audio components.



Disclaimer: This extension is not affiliated with WaveTool, Suno, or Udio. It is an independent hobby project created by a fan of these platforms.
